title: Force Motors partners with EY Parthenon India for digital transformation program
description: Force Motors has partnered with EY Parthenon India to undertake a digital transformation programme aimed at boosting innovation and productivity across its value chain. The collaboration will focus on redesigning Force Motors' digital landscape, implementing advanced digital platforms, technologies, and solutions for customers, and enhancing its capabilities and security.
